author: Ross Davis
comment: Oh dear, World First....... great website, deplorable app..... surely it's worth your while investing a few dollars to get a decent app, have happy customers and make bad reviews a thing of the past
The app has many bugs. Don't hold much confidence in security!

author: Lee Baker
comment: This is the second edit of my review following updating the app by mistake and so ended up with the latest version. I am making this plea to the developers - PLEASE REPUBLISH v2.4 AS A DIFFERENT VERSION IN THE PLAY STORE SO THAT THOSE OF US WHO NEED A FUNCTIONING APP CAN GET ON WITH EVERYTHING ELSE WE HAVE TO DO. Whilst the newest version doesn't seem to be crashing as much, WHERE HAVE SAVED TRADES GONE?? Seriously guys, this is ridiculous for a company that does so well in every other way. Once again I'll be relying on sideloading a backup of the old app and trying to avoid it updating. I'm an optimistic person so maybe we'll see a result in 2018...

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi Lee, sorry for the issues you've experienced.  We've just completely rebuilt the app and would love to know how you feel about it.

author: Rob Kirkbride
comment: Just a poor app that needs a complete rewrite. Basically no really point in it as it stands. Dialogues keep coming up too.

author: Colin Atkinson
comment: Where are the up to date currency rate graphs?

author: Bryce
comment: Version 3.1 just downloaded and it keeps crashing when I try to access 'Saved trades'. The app just closes. Before this update everything worked fine. Please look at adding finger print login as well.

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content:
Hi Bryce,
We have just updated to version 4.0 which we believe is crash-free. We'd love to hear back from you.

author: Gregg Magenheimer
comment: I have changed phones and the app no longer works. I can't even open it now. Tried re-installing but still not working. Frustrated!
Disappointing upgrade. Previous works much better

Previous version was useful providing guidance, up to date currency rates etc. Now just a useless app and I will resort to phoning WF and I will be deleting it. Why do companies like going backwards??

author: Andrew Sadgrove
comment: Continues to come up with internal error.not sure why it needed to change from the previous app.

author: jerrold wee
comment: Bad app. Minimum of 2k to transfer

author: A Anon
comment: Don't waste your time. Very frustrating as it doesn't work. Gone back to using Transferwise as that is so much simpler to use and works every time.

author: Daniel Franks
comment: The previous app was excellent, intuitive and straight forward. This refresh is tragic, lacking all the usability of the predecessor and crashing almost every time. I am actively looking for an alternative.

author: Tony Hobbs
comment: Dishonest.  Quotes a figure, takes your details, knocks $70 off the recipient amount at the last hurdle. Crashes often.

author: Helene B
comment: Ever worse than before telling me I can only transfer minimum 1694.87......impossible to do quick trade.Currencies do not load....

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi Helene, we're sorry for the issues you've faced.  We've just rebuilt the app from scratch and would love to know your opinion.

author: Richard James
comment: This app is a continual source of frustration. Frequently changed but rarely improved. It currently displays gibberish in one option which causes me concerns over its security.

Really like world first but you need to fix few issues. First is a random figure in the amount to be sent, which will then change to another figure when selecting the desired currency, seeing the final conversion rate before filling all fields would be the biggest for me, I spend too much time to go through all of this to just cancel if I don't like the final amount
No longer gives live rates. Don't want to log in.

author: Sushians Moallemi
comment: Why you have change the AP to a useless version. It does not work. It does not give the live rate and it also crashes half way through plugging in my info.

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi Sushians, we're sorry you're having issues with the app. We are working on bringing live rates back.

author: John Lloyd
comment: I used this app to reference exchange rate as well as to transfer funds but now only the later feature is readily available to me. When will the exchange rate browse feature return?

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi John, thanks for the feedback. We are working on bringing live rates in the next version.

comment: Crashing problem now fixed. Very easy to login with a pin and the platform is great. Can send money in seconds.

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: We are happy to hear that you enjoy the new experience. Have a great day!

author: Helga Lecca
comment: New release is horrible due to limited functionality. Where did the live rates go?!?

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content:
Hi Helga, 
Thanks for your feedback.  You can see live rates when you select the currency and amount you would like to send.  We are planning on adding in live rates again but we wanted to release a stripped back but stable version first. Please keep us informed of how you get on with the new interface.

author: EE Khong
comment: Update fixed the crashing issue, need to get used to the new layout, but like the fact that you can see the rate at the start. Would be great if you could save frequently used transactions.

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback!  We will be releasing new functionality soon and we'll take your preference into account.

author: Ian Bloom
comment: Does not work. Very amateur app.

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi Ian, we have just updated the app and we'd love to hear your opinion on it.

comment: What a load of crap . Full stop

author: Emmanuel Nico
comment: Does not work. Crashes

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi Emmanuel, we have just released a new update which we believe is crash-free. Give it a try.

author: Jo Foley
comment: Can't even make a trade. Can access anything always crashing. Useless

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content: Hi Jo, we're sorry for the problems you've had.  We've just rebuilt the app from the ground up and would love to know your opinion.

title: Crashes unusable

author: Emery Tus
comment: I was drawn to this fund transfer service because of its claim of beating bank exchange rates. However, they don't tell which bank's exchange rates they talk about. Because there is a big difference between the rates of sending banks and those of the receiving banks. When you send $s to some European country, the latter banks exchange the $s at much better rates than the US banks. But World First only saves you same money compared to the US banks, but make you a loser against the European exchange rates.

reply.author: World First Limited
reply.content:
Apologies for the inconvenience caused whilst using our service. We carry out extensive market research and on average we can save our clients up to 2%.
We should be able to make you a saving on your transactions versus the bank as we offer a best rate guarantee to our customers. https://goo.gl/og8QNX

Contact us at clientrelations@worldfirst.com.

title: Misleading comparison

author: Noah Abraham
comment: Just downloaded the app, I have been using their website and after you confirm and set up everything they save a secure online account that is like a bank account. I have converted 5,000 USD to KES and sent to my wife. They have a option to buy money from every country on main website and after you buy it saves your order and notifies you when the exchange rate is the best. This means you can buy at good exchange rates and just keep switching currency on their website make money each time by buying low
title: Using website

author: Sam ShepCap
comment: Can't do transactions for the company acct. Useless at the moment.
title: Still no corporate access

author: Marco Romero
comment: Why doesn't this app have all the currencies on the Live Rate? I only need one and it doesn't have it
title: Why?

author: simmy sim
comment: Efficient and easy to use app, rates are always a few points away from interbank rate, not miles away though
title: Quite good

author: Colin Sare-Soar
comment: Fantastic app for transferring money abroad, simple to set up and use.
title: GREAT app

author: Stuart Curtis
comment: Use it to transfer £££ into €€€ regularly. Quick, easy and fair rates
title: Quick and Easy

author: Yordi Tesfay
comment: Excellent report of the transfer till it reaches to the person who receives.
title: Updating

author: Garry Summers
comment: Fantastic app would recommend it for sure
title: Money transfer

author: Antolin Soldado
comment: Good app and easy to use
title: Easy to use

author: Steve Pierre
comment: Since you fixed my problem, excellent.. simple, easy to use very good app to transfer money ..well done..

author: Rex Lester
comment: Ooops, it was all going so well, what went wrong?

author: papito papito
comment: helpfull
title: its ok
